br.ufmg.dcc.saotome.beholder.ui

Interface Link

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Clickable, Component, Displayable

    public interface Link
extends Component, Clickable
    This class represents the hyperlink component of HTML. Hyperlinks are modeled in HTML with the tag <a>.
    Author:
    icaroclever

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getHypertextReference()
      Get the hypertext reference (href) attribute of the component loaded in the interface.
      void loadByHypertextReference(java.lang.String url)
      Load the interface element using the attribute href as the unique identifier, overwriting the old object by the new one loaded.

        getAttribute, getId, getName, loadByAttribute, loadById, loadByName, setAttribute, setId, setName

    • Method Detail

      • getHypertextReference

        java.lang.String getHypertextReference()
        Get the hypertext reference (href) attribute of the component loaded in the interface.

        value of href attribute.

      • loadByHypertextReference

        void loadByHypertextReference(java.lang.String url)
        Load the interface element using the attribute href as the unique identifier, overwriting the old object by the new one loaded.
        Parameters:
        url - the attribute href value
